legacy.full_text:
#India has recorded over 84,000 new COVID-19 cases and more than 4,000 new deaths in the past 24 hours. 
The health ministry says there have been a total of nearly 30 million infections in the country, 
but most cases have been treated and discharged from hospital. (REUTERS) https://t.co/GHEhHf4Iay

legacy.full_text:
China bids to achieve harmony between man and nature. 
#XiQuotes

"Act according to the seasons and the land. You will gain more with less." This advice is from a Chinese encyclopedia on agriculture written in the sixth century.

How do the Chinese people follow this philosophy in their work and life? Click for more. #XiQuotes
